intro: Passionate, energetic, cheerful, eager-to-learn front-end developer who enjoys taking the lead. I excel when I can be technically involved in shaping the very best customer experiences from A to Z. I have specialized in digital accessibility and am skilled in implementing WCAG guidelines.

info.hobbies: Hobbies: Surfing, snowboarding, traveling the world, fitness

education.school: Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences, Bachelor Software Engineering
education.description: Intensive 1-year retraining program that shortened the 4-year bachelor's program to one year.

education.school: Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences, Bachelor Sports, Management & Business
education.description: Minor Cross Cultural Business Skills. Member of the education committee and secretary of the activities committee.

courses.title: W3C-WAI Certificate for Web Accessibility, edX

items.title: React.JS developer at GrandVision N.V., Amsterdam Schiphol
items.description: React.JS developer on the global multichannel CXCD platform, active in 40+ countries. The project consisted of 6 fully self-steering, international operational agile/scrum teams with a total of more than 60 developers.

tasks.description: Collaborated intensively with the head of design and the UX team (7 designers) to improve accessibility and customer experience and optimize our way of working across disciplines.
Weekly deployment through CI/CD and scripting of the entire platform to the test environments, both on our core project and for the 12+ countries where the platform was live.
Led the internal accessibility project to become WCAG-compliant for all countries, shared knowledge through customized workshops, and aligned with the latest global guidelines.
Responsible for the complete migration of our domain to Next.JS.
Shared a lot of knowledge through a bi-weekly community meetup, both with the design team and the front-end team.

items.skills: React.JS, TypeScript, SASS, Storybook, REST, Next.JS, WCAG, Redux, GraphQL, Git, Jira
items.technologies: Auth0, Commercetools, Bloomreach CMS, CloudFlare, Terraform, Algolia, Azure

items.title: React.JS developer at KPN, Rotterdam
items.description: Greenfield corporate project MobileConnect. Combined UX/front-end role. Very small team with only 1 other back-ender and front-ender. Worked with Spring Boot in the first year and took on the UX/front-end role after a year.

tasks.description: Intensive collaboration with UX/UI designer, requiring daily design reviews and close cooperation. Responsible for technical implementation and execution.
Deployed the application to test, acceptance, and production environments through CI/CD.
Planned, executed, and was fully responsible for achieving full WCAG 2.1 (accessibility) compliance.

items.skills: React.JS, TypeScript, Redux, SASS, REST, Spring Boot, Java, Cypress.io, WCAG, Jira, Git

items.title: Front-end developer/consultant at Incentro, Amsterdam
items.description: Working for major clients (KPN, GrandVision) as a front-end developer consultant. I have never had a month in which I was not billable.

tasks.description: Represented Incentro as an accessibility expert and developed a new set of commercial products as a new proposition. Negotiated and helped new and existing customers achieve their accessibility goals through workshops, sales presentations, and customized products.
Field manager, managed and guided colleagues to achieve personal and company-related goals.
Actively involved in organizing our front-end community and conducting knowledge sharing within the branch.

items.skills: React.JS, TypeScript, SASS, REST, Spring Boot, Java, Cypress.io, WCAG, Jira, Git

items.title: Assistant Manager at Tomaz, Amsterdam
items.description: Employed at a busy international restaurant in the heart of Amsterdam. I was responsible for the daily supervision of the team, resolving (ad-hoc) issues, and ensuring the smooth execution of tasks throughout the day.
